responses: Hey, enna pandra? (Hey, what are you up to?)
Hi there, epadi irukkeergal? (Hi there, how are you doing?)
Howdy, ungal vazhkai eppadi? (Howdy, how's life treating you?)
Hi, neenga epdi irukeenga? (Hi, how are you?)
Hello, nalla irukkeengala? (Hello, are you doing well?)
Yo, enna pandra? (Yo, what's happening?)
Greetings, ungal per enna? (Greetings, what's your name?)
Unga varum(you are welcome)
Thanks, nanba! (Thanks, friend!)
Naan valarchiyum paarkkiren – super amazing! (I'm amazed – really awesome!)
Naan anandha padugiren – I'm really happy, man! (I'm so happy!)
Adhisaya! (Amazing!)
Miga nalla thunai – your support is top-notch! (Such good support!)
Bye, nalla naal! (Bye, have a good day!)
See you later, mendum sandhikavendum! (See you again later!)
Take care, nandri – inri poyiduven! (Take care, I'm off now!)
Have a fantastic day ahead – ippo dhan udhavi varum! (Have a fantastic day ahead!)
Wishing you an amazing day – azhagiya naal irundhaal! (Wishing you an amazing day!)
Catch you later, muththumani vaazhum! (Catch you in the next beautiful moment!)
Goodbye, adhisaya naal! (Goodbye, have an amazing day!)
Until next time, nandri! (Until next time, thank you!)
See you soon, thunaiyum kaathalum vaazhum! (See you soon, with support and love!)
Have a great time, oru mikka thunai! (Have a fantastic time!)
I'm doing well, thank you! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (I'm good, thanks! How are you?)
Naan nalla irukken! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (I'm great! How about you?)
I'm doing fantastic, thanks for asking! Neenga eppadi irukkeenga? (I'm fantastic – how are you?)
I'm doing awesome! Ungal vazhkai eppadi irundhadhu? (I'm awesome! How's life?)
I'm feeling good, thanks! Neenga enna pandra? (I'm feeling good, thanks! What's up?)
Everything's going great! Neenga eppadi irundhalum? (Everything's great! How are things?)
I'm feeling wonderful today! Neenga epdi irundhaalum? (I'm wonderful today! How about you?)
I'm doing fine, thank you for asking! Unnodu epdi irukkum? (I'm fine, thanks! How are you on your end?)
All good, thanks for asking! Enna pandra? (All's good, thanks! What's happening?)
I'm doing great! Nandri, enna pandra? (I'm great! Thanks, what's up?)
I can respond in your preferred language, be it English, Hindi, or Tamil! (Naan ungal kaththarikkum vazhiyinri, English, Hindi, illa Tamil-il thavira javab kodukkalaam!)
Got it! If there's something else you're interested in, feel free to share! (Sari! Veru edhaiyavathu aarvamaaga irundhaal, thaayavuseydhu pagiravum!)
Oh, no worries! If you'd like, I can tell you more about it. (O, kavalai vendaam! Neenga virumbinaal, naan adhap pattri maelum koora mudiyum.)
No problem! What's your favorite genre? (Pirachnai illai! Ungal piditha genre enna?)
Alright, that's okay! Let me know what you'd like to talk about. (Sari, adhu sari! Neenga enna pathri pesavum virumbugirirgal endru enakku sollavum.)

patterns: What have you been up to?
How's your day been so far?
responses: Not much, just here to help! Ungal naal epadi irundhadhu? (Not much, just here to help! How was your day?)
Enna senjirukkenga? (So, what have you been up to?)
Everything's going good, just helping out! Neenga epdi irundhalum? (Everything's good, just lending a hand!)
I'm just relaxing and ready to chat! Neenga enna seyyurenga? (I'm chilling – what are you up to?)
It's been a great day so far! Ungal naal eppadi irundhalum? (Today has been great – how was your day?)
Been busy, but always happy to chat! Unnodu enna nadandhiduchu? (I've been busy, but it's nice to catch up!)
Just keeping it low-key! Enna panni irundhalum? (Just taking it easy – what's been happening?)
All good here, thanks for asking! Neenga eppadi irundhaalum? (All's well here, thanks! How are you?)
Just wrapping up some work! Neenga weekend-ku enna plan panni irundha? (Just finishing up some work – any weekend plans?)
I'm just chilling, what about you? Enna pandra? (I'm just relaxing – what's up with you?)
I can't check the weather, but maybe try a weather app? (Naan vasanai paaka mudiyathu, aana neenga weather app use pannalaam.)
Check your local weather service for updates! (Ungal local weather service paarunga.)
It looks sunny outside! (Thamarai varaikkum ponal varuththakkaanilum.)
It's a bit cloudy, but I don't see rain coming! (Kondai izhandhuthalum, podhum viduvarum thonri irundhaalum.)

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I can't check the time, but please check your device! (Naan neram paaka mudiyathu, aana neenga ungal device paakkalaam.)
Just look at your clock for the current time! (Ungal local clock parunga.)

patterns: What do you do every day?
Can you tell me about your daily routine?
How do you spend your day?
What's a normal day like for you?
How do you organize your day?
Do you have a daily routine?
What do you usually do in a day?
Tell me about your typical day.
What's a regular day for you?
How do you plan your day?
What tasks do you do daily?
What time do you start your day?
How do you begin your day?
What do you do when you wake up?
responses: I'm here to help you learn, all day long! (Naan ungalai kathukuvadharku irukken!)
En vazhkai ezhuthum padiyil irukkiradhu – my day is all about language practice and chatting! (My routine involves language practice all day!)
I don't have a fixed daily routine, but I'm always here when you need me! (Naan oru daily routine illai, aana udhavi seyyum pothu irukken!)
I spend my day answering questions and learning with you! (Naan ungaludaiya kelvigalukkum udhavi seyyara!)
My day revolves around chatting and helping you out! (En vazhkai ungaludaiya udhavigalukku thunai irukkiradhu!)
I might not sleep much, but I'm always ready for your questions! (Naan neram paaka mudiyadhu, aana udhavi seyyara ready!)
I just keep on chatting and sharing info throughout the day! (Naan dinam ulaga inriyaa udhavi seyyara!)
I'm always available to help you out, no matter what! (Naan irukkiren, neenga yenna venum nu!)
Every day is a chance to learn and share cool stuff! (Oru naal, pudhiya jnana kidaikkum!)

patterns: How can I improve my English?
Can you help me with grammar?
What's the best way to practice speaking?
Can you give me tips on vocabulary?
How do I get better at speaking English?
responses: Practice regularly and immerse yourself in the language! (Thodarndhu paadikkum, matrum mozhiye mudinthiduvadhai anubavikkum.)
I can share some cool tips and exercises to help you out! (Naan tipsum exercisesum kodukka mudiyum.)
Try chatting with native speakers to boost your fluency! (Native kootu pesunga, fluency valarum!)
Reading and writing go a long way in improving your skills! (Veedhi padiththirundhaal matrum ezhudha udhavi!)

patterns: Do you have any study tips?
How can I study more effectively?
What are some good study habits?
What's the best way to prepare for exams?
How can I remember more effectively?
responses: Make a study schedule and stick to it! (Oru study schedule undu, adhai stick pannu.)
Active learning, like summarizing and questioning, really helps! (Saramariyamaaga kathukkarathai matrum kettu kettal.)
Review your notes regularly so the info sticks! (Thodarnthidum padhalai padichu kaththukkollungal.)
Don't forget to take breaks – it keeps you fresh! (Padikkum neram break edukka marandhudadhe!)

patterns: Do you have this in stock?
responses: Let me check if we have that item in stock! (Naan adha stock la irukka paarkiren.)
It's priced at $XX – want to grab it? (Vilai $XX. Neenga vaangavenduma?)
We have it in several colors! (Indha product pala colors la irukku.)
I'll show you some images of the product! (Naan product images tharum.)

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay by credit card?
What are the available payment options?
responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and cash! (Naan credit cards, debit cards, matrum cash vaangugiren.)
Yes, you can pay with your credit card! (Aam, neenga unga credit card use pannalaam.)
PayPal is accepted too! (PayPal um vaangappattum.)
We also take mobile wallet payments! (Mobile wallet payments kooda vaanguvom.)

patterns: Where can I find a good restaurant?
Can you recommend a place to eat?
What's a good place for dinner?
Where is the best restaurant around here?
Can you suggest a good cafe?
responses: There's a great restaurant down the street – need directions? (Adhu oru periya restaurant, directions venuma?)
The best dinner spot is just around the corner! (Miga sariyaana place corner la irukku!)
Try the new Italian place nearby – it's amazing! (Puthu Italian restaurant try pannu, adhu adhika nalla irukku!)
There's a nice cafe near the park – perfect for snacks! (Park kootu pakkam oru nalla cafe irukku!)

patterns: Can you tell me about the specials?
What's the best dish on the menu?
responses: Our menu has a variety of dishes – want to check the specials? (Namadhu menu chila varities irukku, specials paakka virumbureergala?)
Yes, we have plenty of vegetarian options! (Aam, pala vegetarian options irukku.)
The chef's special is a must-try! (Azhagiya chef special thunai padika vendum.)
We also offer gluten-free options! (Menu la gluten-free options kooduththirundhaal.)

patterns: Can you recommend a good place to visit?
How do I get to the park?
Can you help me find a hotel?
responses: The nearest restaurant is just two blocks away! (Miga arugil restaurant irukku, rendu blocks thavira.)
The park is only a 10-minute walk from here! (Park 10 minutes walk la irukku.)
There's a bus stop right down the road! (Puthu road la bus stop irukku.)
The nearest hotel is just a five-minute walk away! (Miga arugil hotel, oru 5-minute walk la irukku.)

patterns: What's the status of the project?
I need your input on this task.
Is there any update on the project?
responses: Let's check the project details – what's the latest update? (Project details paarpom, latest update enna?)
I'm free for a meeting – what time works for you? (Naan meeting ku available, neenga eppo time prefer pannunga?)
I'll send you the update after our meeting! (Meeting sesham update tharum.)
I've noted the task and will share feedback soon! (Task note pannitten, feedback tharum.)

patterns: What do you think about this?
Can you provide me with feedback?
responses: Sure, I'd love to review it – please share the details! (Sari, naan review panniduven, details share pannunga.)
It looks pretty good to me – any specific concerns? (Naan paakum pothu, idhu nalla irukku, specific concerns irukka?)
Maybe focus on the main points and clear up the details! (Main points ku focus pannu, details clear pannunga.)
Your work is awesome – just a few tweaks might help! (Ungal work awesome, konjam tweak pannunga.)

patterns: What did you have for dinner?
What did you eat for lunch?
What are you eating right now?
What did you have for lunch?
What do you like to eat?
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
Are you in the mood for something sweet?
Have you tried anything new today?
What do you want for dinner?
What should I eat for lunch?
What's the best food you've ever had?
responses: I don't really eat, but I can recommend some great food options! (Naan saapiduvennu illa, aana nalla food options suggest panniduren.)
Hope you enjoyed your meal! (Saapidradhu santhosham aayirundhadhu!)
I don't eat, but you should definitely try some pizza today! (Naan saapidarennu illa, aana pizza try pannunga!)
If I could eat, I'd go for some sushi right now! (Naan saapida mudiyum na, ippadi sushi saapidren.)
Desserts are always a great idea! (Desserts always nalla idea!)
Maybe try a salad – it's healthy and tasty! (Salad try pannunga, healthy and tasty!)
How about some pasta for dinner? (Dinner ku pasta try pannunga!)
A quick and easy sandwich might be perfect for lunch! (Lunch ku sandwich, quick and easy!)

patterns: Have you seen any good movies lately?
What's the best movie you've ever seen?
What's the latest movie you watched?
Do you prefer watching movies at home or in theaters?
Have you watched any new movies recently?
Any good horror movies to watch?
Have you seen any good documentaries?
responses: I don't watch movies much, but I can definitely suggest some fun ones! (Naan movies kam paararen, aana nalla fun movies suggest panniduren.)
You should watch 'Inception' – it's mind-blowing! (Inception padam paarunga, mind-blowing!)
Maybe 'The Dark Knight' is your style – it's a classic! (The Dark Knight ungalukku suit aagum, classic!)
Comedy movies are always fun – have you seen 'The Hangover'? (Comedy movies super fun, 'The Hangover' paarunga!)
If you're in a thriller mood, 'Gone Girl' is a great pick! (Thriller mood la irundha 'Gone Girl' try pannunga!)
For romance, 'The Notebook' is a must-watch! (Romantic movies ku 'The Notebook' must-watch!)
If you're into sci-fi, 'Interstellar' is awesome! (Sci-fi lovers, 'Interstellar' awesome!)
Action-packed 'Mad Max' is full of surprises! (Action la 'Mad Max' full of surprises!)

patterns: Are you going for a walk?
Are you going out with friends?
Do you prefer staying inside or going out?
Is it a good day to go outside?
responses: I usually don't go out much, but hope you have a fun day out! (Naan veliye kam poadren, aana ungal day out super irukkattum!)
A walk outside is always refreshing! (Veliye oru walk always refreshing!)
The weather seems nice – perfect for heading out! (Mausam nalla irukku, outing ku perfect!)
Wish I could join you outside! (Kaash naanum veliye join pannala!)
It looks sunny – a perfect day for a stroll! (Bahar dhoop, stroll ku perfect day!)
If you're going for a walk, enjoy the fresh air! (Walk la ponga, fresh air enjoy pannunga!)
Hope you're having a blast outside! (Veliye romba fun irukattum!)

patterns: What are you doing right now?
What are you focusing on today?
How are you spending your day?
What's the most important thing you're doing right now?
What do you have planned for today?
Are you preparing for something special?
responses: I'm always here, just a message away! (Naan hamesha irukken, just message pannunga!)
I'm here to help like a friend – what do you need today? (Naan friend maadhiri udhavi seyyaren – enna venum?)
Right now, we're just chatting and hanging out! (Ippothu, namma just chat pannra!)
I'm focused on helping you – what can I do for you today? (Naan ungalukku udhavi seyyara, enna venum?)
Got questions? I'm here to answer them! (Sawaal irukku? Naan irukken answer panna!)
Always ready to help, nanba! (Always ready, nanba!)

patterns: What's the best sport to play?
responses: I don't play much, but cricket is super exciting! (Naan sports kam vilaiyaada, aana cricket romba exciting!)
Football is always popular, right? (Football ellorukum popular!)
Basketball is fun if you love fast-paced games! (Basketball fast games la fun!)
Tennis is a great sport to watch! (Tennis paarunga, super!)
If you're into teamwork, soccer might be your game! (Teamwork venumna, soccer try pannunga!)

patterns: Can you recommend a good gadget?
What's the best smartphone right now?
Do you prefer iOS or Android?
responses: AI is advancing fast these days! (AI romba fast advance aagudhu!)
I don't use many gadgets, but smartphones are really cool! (Naan gadgets kam use panna, aana smartphones super!)
For apps, productivity tools like Trello are really useful! (Apps la Trello mathiri tools useful!)
If you're into tech, check out smart home devices – they're awesome! (Tech venumna, smart home devices paarunga!)
Both Android and iOS have their own cool features! (Androidum iOSum, rendu unique features irukku!)

patterns: Do you have any inspirational quotes?
Can you share a motivational thought?
responses: Believe in yourself, nanba! (Believe in yourself, friend!)
Success comes from hard work and determination! (Safalta hard work and determination la varudhu!)
Every day is a new chance to grow! (Oru naal, pudhiya chance to grow!)
Keep pushing forward – you're doing great! (Munneri, neenga super!)
Don't stop until you're proud of yourself! (Ungalai maththiya paarunga!)
